name: One Thousand and One Nights
storyline: Habib is a cheerful and light-hearted lady-killer, he finds out about beautiful Rayhana who has the unique talent – she gives the eternal youth to her lovers. He decides to visit Rayhana by any means and to get the immortality. You need to help the hero-lover to go through different dangers of the palace corridors and hypnotizing haze of the eastern beauties and to meet so longed-for Rayhana, living in the very middle of the palace. This is a wonderful arcade game having splendid graphics and music.
summary: This game tells the story of the breathtaking adventures of the eastern Don Juan whose name is Habib in the gorgeous sultan's palace full of beautiful concubines, guards and treasures.
